name: ben-mayer-firebase-nuxt
description: This is a nuxt.js fibase test
author: benmayer

scripts.install: cd src && yarn install && cd ../functions && yarn install
scripts.copy:public: mkdir -p public/_nuxt && cp -r src/.nuxt/dist/client/ public/_nuxt && cp -a src/static/. public/
scripts.copy:functions: cp -r src/.nuxt/ functions/nuxt/ && cp src/nuxt.config.js functions/
scripts.predeploy:functions: yarn clean:functions && yarn build && yarn copy:functions
